show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #61 Steve Campbell
subtitle: #61 Steve Campbell
summary:
I sat down with Steve Campbell from Tailor Made Cattle to talk about everything except for Red Solo cup cows. I wanted to hear about Steve and how he learned what he has about the relationship between minerals and cows. As usual, we chase all sorts of crazy rabbits and have a very enjoyable conversation.

Steve's Website

Sugar vs. Cholesterol: John Yudkin vs. Ancel Keys

Working Cows Podcast 196

Bonsma Lectures (Out of print on Amazon)
